name: Liminal Harbor
description:
Short surreal game where you interact with the world. 

Features

-Play minigames

-Talk to A.I. NPC

-Explore dream areas 

-Look at A.I. Generated art

Controls 

-Arrow Keys to move

-Escape to open main menu or exit minigames

-Press X to interact with environment 

-Press F to raise brightness

-Press G to lower brightness
